Hipstopgm User Manual(0)               Hipstopgm User Manual(0)



Table Of Contents


NAME
       hipstopgm - convert a HIPS file into a PGM image


SYNOPSIS
       hipstopgm [hipsfile]


DESCRIPTION
       This program is part of Netpbm(1).

       hipstopgm  reads a HIPS file as input and produces a PGM
       image as output.

       If the  HIPS  file  contains  more  than  one  frame  in
       sequence, hipstopgm will concatenate all the frames ver-
       tically.

       HIPS is a format developed at the Human Information Pro-
       cessing Laboratory, NYU.


SEE ALSO
       pgm(1)


AUTHOR
       Copyright (C) 1989 by Jef Poskanzer.



netpbm documentation      24 August 89 Hipstopgm User Manual(0)
